name: Caterpillar Dissent: Deliverance
description:
browser version is a lot less enjoyable than windows version because the cursor doesn't lock to the game so turning the camera doesn't work well. Also the lighting is a lot better on windows version

WASD: move

LeftShift: "Sprint"

Space: ROLL!

in case of emergency: use F to accelerate towards the ground. The physics might send you flying in the air which is totally a feature and not a glitch, but if you want to come back down to earth hold F.

Made for LD 47 game jam.

This project was kind of a disaster. It was supposed to be made by a team of 2, but person 2 dropped out of the project very late and contributed nothing so the gameplay is very shallow and reflects that.

All of the assets except for the music were made from scratch for this game jam
